Text: Thanks.  I've been wanting to try this out.

Glad i could help amihell. But be warned FPS Creator uses a very simple graphics engine, which some people could class as outdated, but hey its all a bit of fun and good to get started with. If your planning on going into game development seriously, a game engine like Torque should be your next step, and maybe who knows, one day you might be one of the lucky few who can get the Unreal 3 engine :P
